meaningMnemonic: The verb form of <kanji>compose</kanji> is <vocabulary>to compose</vocabulary>. This particular verb is usually used in relation to poetry, and can also mean <vocabulary>to recite</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>to sing</vocabulary>, though more in the sense of singing someone's praises than singing a song.
readingMnemonic: This word shares the same origin as 歌う and 唄う, and they share the same readings as well.
